attributes.action: Fire the Education Secretary Gavin Williamson
attributes.additional_details: Gavin has shown that he doesn't care about the people he represents and must immediately be replaced by someone capable of running as the Education Secretary!!!
attributes.background: Gavin Williamson has failed Students, Teachers and Parents. He has refused to stop BTEC exams during COVID19 and has refused any help from companies like BT to supply free/cheap internet to disadvantage children struggling with education during lockdown.

rejection.details:
We can't publish petitions about honours or appointments. That includes calling for Ministers to be sacked or to resign.

If you're concerned about a particular policy or decision that's the responsibility of Government or the House of Commons, you could sign or start a petition about that.
